executePrerequisites.description: Whether to execute prerequisites automatically for this BDL Agent instance.
executePrerequisites.title: Execute prerequisites

executePrerequisitesZkPolicy.description: Create Zookeeper policy automatically for this BDL Agent instance.
executePrerequisitesZkPolicy.title: Create zookeeper policy

externalConfiguration.name: externalConfiguration
externalConfiguration.title: External configuration
externalConfiguration.description: Find here some configuration options for the external resources.

executePrerequisitesChRoot.description: Whether to execute prerequisites automatically for this BDL Agent instance setting ACLs in the chroot configured.
executePrerequisitesChRoot.title: Create chroot policy (select only if 'Chroot to apply to Zookeeper connection' is filled)

zookeeperChroot.description:
Chroot to apply to Zookeeper connection. In case of using a prefix, there are additional permissions resources to add: 
 Ex1: If Zookeeper Chroot: /catalog , the following read resource should be added to Gosec (additionaly to the automatically created resources): 
 /catalog 
Ex2: If Zookeeper Chroot: /catalog/mypath, the following read resources should be added to Gosec (additionaly to the automatically created resources): 
 /catalog
 /catalog/mypath
zookeeperChroot.title: Zookeeper Chroot (NOTE: If you are using this param, you need to configure additional permissions, check help)

bdlCatalogsBasicDefinitionPrefixes.title: BDL Crossdata catalog names (comma-separated list of names)

examples: \[\{ class = "org.apache.spark.sql.crossdata.catalyst.catalog.persistent.zookeeper.ZookeeperCatalog", prefix = "xdcatalog", zookeeper.connectionString = "zk-0001.s000001-zk1.s000001.mesos:2181,zk-0002.s000001-zk1.s000001.mesos:2181,zk-0003.s000001-zk1.s000001.mesos:2181" \}, \{ class = "org.apache.spark.sql.crossdata.catalyst.catalog.persistent.zookeeper.ZookeeperCatalog", prefix = "bdlcatalog", zookeeper.connectionString = "zk-0001.s000001-zk1.s000001.mesos:2181,zk-0002.s000001-zk1.s000001.mesos:2181,zk-0003.s000001-zk1.s000001.mesos:2181" \}\]
bdlCatalogsAdvancedDefinition.title: BDL Crossdata catalogs definition

approlename.description: App role used to recover a Vault token with a pre-defined policy
approlename.title: Vault role

calico.name: calico
calico.title: Calico Network
calico.description: Set the calico network where BDL Agent will be deployed.

resources.name: resources
resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Set the resources where agent will be deployed.

bdlAgentPublisherMode.description: Publisher mode makes the agent to publish collection layers (technical and semantic). If disabled, it will not monitor collections and will not publish them.
bdlAgentPublisherMode.title: Enable publisher mode?

bdlAgentOptimizerMode.description: Optimizer mode makes the agent to optimize JDBC tables registered at Stratio Governance, finding out their best partition column to optimize Spark access to them.
bdlAgentOptimizerMode.title: Enable optimizer mode?

bdlAgentAdditionalJars.description: Comma-separated list of files (usually driver jars) needed by BDL Agent. They will be fetched during agent's start-up.
bdlAgentAdditionalJars.title: Additional jars

bdlAgentCollectionBlacklist.description: Matching collections will not be monitored
bdlAgentCollectionBlacklist.title: Collections blacklist

bdlGovernanceCompatibleSemanticCollectio.title: Create semantic layer compatible with previous Crossdata versions?

bdlGovernanceOntologyUseOperationalExten.title: Use schema while calling extensions at operational semantic layer?

publisherCronSettings.name: publisherCronSettings
publisherCronSettings.title: Publisher Cron settings
publisherCronSettings.description: Define when will the agent publish collection layers

bdlAgentForcedCronRetryAttempts.title: Publisher mode forced execution retry attempts

bdlAgentJdbcOptimizerFallbackToDialects.description: When no optimization could be found using memory-based mode, sets if optimizer should fallback to dialects-based mode
bdlAgentJdbcOptimizerFallbackToDialects.title: Fallback to dialects-based optimization?

bdlAgentJdbcOptimizerForceForcedPartitio.description: Optimizer will use forcedPartitionColumn even if it is not valid
bdlAgentJdbcOptimizerForceForcedPartitio.title: Use forcedPartitionColumn always?

bdlAgentJdbcOptimizerInitialSize.description: Number of rows to be loaded when starting optimization process
bdlAgentJdbcOptimizerInitialSize.title: Partition's initial size

bdlAgentJdbcOptimizerMemorySize.description: Maximum memory to be used to calculate partitioning. It should be desired partition size plus ~60Mb
bdlAgentJdbcOptimizerMemorySize.title: Memory limit

optimizerCronSettings.name: optimizerCronSettings
optimizerCronSettings.title: Optimizer Cron settings
optimizerCronSettings.description: Define when will the agent optimize JDBC tables

bdlAgentJdbcOptimizationForcedCronRetryA.title: Optimizer mode forced execution retry attempts

asyncHealthCheck.name: asyncHealthCheck
asyncHealthCheck.title: Asynchronous health check settings
asyncHealthCheck.description: Common configuration for asynchronous health checks

asyncHealthCheckInterval.description: How often asynchronous health checks will be executed
asyncHealthCheckInterval.title: Interval

adaptiveAsyncHealthCheck.name: adaptiveAsyncHealthCheck
adaptiveAsyncHealthCheck.title: Adaptive asynchronous health check settings
adaptiveAsyncHealthCheck.description: Common configuration for adaptive asynchronous health checks

adaptiveAsyncHealthCheckInitialDelay.description: Starting delay to execute adaptive health checks
adaptiveAsyncHealthCheckInitialDelay.title: Initial delay

adaptiveAsyncHealthCheckMinDelay.description: Minimum delay to execute adaptive health checks. Adaptive health checks will be executed with this delay at most.
adaptiveAsyncHealthCheckMinDelay.title: Minimum delay

adaptiveAsyncHealthCheckMaxDelay.description: Maximum delay to execute adaptive health checks. Adaptive health checks will be executed with this delay at least.
adaptiveAsyncHealthCheckMaxDelay.title: Maximum delay

adaptiveAsyncHealthCheckDelayFactor.description: Factor to apply to current delay to get next delay (depending on health check's status)
adaptiveAsyncHealthCheckDelayFactor.title: Scaling factor

zookeeper.name: zookeeper
zookeeper.title: Zookeeper settings
zookeeper.description: Common configuration for Crossdata catalogs inside Zookeeper

constraintName.description: Set the name of the given constraint
constraintName.title: Constraint name

constraintOperator.description: Set operator to run the constraint
constraintOperator.title: Constraint operator

constraintValue.description: Set the value of the constraint
constraintValue.title: Constraint value
